Introduction
This topic contains general information about severance of SC, such as
applying 38 CFR 3.105(a) and 38 CFR 3.105(d)
due to diagnosis change
, and
severance of clearly illegal grants of SC
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section B - Severance of Service Connection (SC)
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section B
